hypothesis_content.title: Contrarian Social Media Fade - Extreme Negative Sentiment Reversal
hypothesis_content.statement: When Bitcoin social media sentiment (CryptoQuant Social Sentiment Index) reaches extreme negative levels (<0.2, 10th percentile) during NEUTRAL or BULL regimes, and price is above the 50-day moving average, a long position will generate positive alpha within 5 trading days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Extreme negative sentiment during stable/uptrend regimes often represents capitulation or overreaction. Retail traders panic-sell at bottoms while institutions accumulate. The 50-day SMA filter ensures we're not catching falling knives in structural downtrends.
entry_conditions: No major negative news in past 24h (Black Swan Index < 0.3)

exit_conditions.take_profit: 7% gain OR sentiment index crosses above 0.5
exit_conditions.stop_loss: 4% loss OR price closes below 50-day SMA

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Median 5-day return after entry conditions is ≤0% OR Sharpe ratio < 0.5 over 100+ historical instances.
